entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 04:33 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
